com.pega.pegarules.pub.context

Interface PRDistributedObjectManager

  • Deprecated. 
    This class is deprecated in favor of the componentized cluster in platform/kernel/cluster. See the readme for more information. Email GenesisTeam@pega.com with any questions

    @Deprecated
public interface PRDistributedObjectManager
    PRDistributedObjectManager : Gives access to distributed objects supported by Cluster.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String VERSION
      Deprecated. 
       

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends java.io.Serializable>
      boolean      		 containsDistributedMap(java.lang.String aCategory, java.lang.Class<T> aObjectClass, int maxObjectSize)
      Deprecated. 
      Checks if the requested map is present in the cluster.
      Warning: Currently this functionality is supported only for Hazelcast clusters and not supported for other clusters.
      <T extends java.io.Serializable>
      PRDistributedMap      		 getDistributedMap(java.lang.String aCategory, java.lang.Class<T> aObjectClass, int maxObjectSize)
      Deprecated. 
      Gets the requested map from the cluster if it is present, else creates it in the cluster.
      Warning: Currently this functionality is supported only for Hazelcast clusters and not supported for other clusters.

    • Method Detail

      • getDistributedMap

        <T extends java.io.Serializable> PRDistributedMap getDistributedMap(java.lang.String aCategory,
                                                                    java.lang.Class<T> aObjectClass,
                                                                    int maxObjectSize)
        Deprecated. 
        Gets the requested map from the cluster if it is present, else creates it in the cluster.
        Warning: Currently this functionality is supported only for Hazelcast clusters and not supported for other clusters.
        Parameters:
        aCategory - - category of the distributed map
        aObjectClass - - class to be stored in the map
        maxObjectSize - - the projected maximum size of any individual stored object
        Returns:
        PRDistributedMap

      • containsDistributedMap

        <T extends java.io.Serializable> boolean containsDistributedMap(java.lang.String aCategory,
                                                                java.lang.Class<T> aObjectClass,
                                                                int maxObjectSize)
        Deprecated. 
        Checks if the requested map is present in the cluster.
        Warning: Currently this functionality is supported only for Hazelcast clusters and not supported for other clusters.
        Parameters:
        aCategory -
        aObjectClass -
        maxObjectSize -
        Returns:
        true if the map exists, false otherwise
